edu.biu.scapi.interactiveMidProtocols.sigmaProtocol.utility

Interface SigmaProtocolMsg

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SigmaBIMsg, SigmaGroupElementMsg, SigmaMultipleMsg

    public interface SigmaProtocolMsg
extends java.io.Serializable
    Every Sigma protocol prover/receiver needs to send messages during the protocol execution.

    This interface is a marker interface for Sigma protocol message, where there is an implementing class for each concrete Sigma message, like GroupElement message or BigInteger message.

    Author:
    Cryptography and Computer Security Research Group Department of Computer Science Bar-Ilan University (Moriya Farbstein)
